create_post.location_hint: Don't forget to add a location so people can find it easily.

helping.Introduce1: These Terms of Use establish the terms for using Yumyarn's social media.
helping.Prohibited_Actions1: If Yumyarn determines that the following actions by users (hereinafter referred to as “users”) have been taken or are likely to be taken, Yumyarn has the right to delete the stated content and take other measures without prior notice.
helping.Prohibited_Actions3: Political activities, electoral activities, religious activities
helping.Prohibited_Actions4: Posting for criminal purposes or promoting criminal agendas
helping.Inappropriate_content5: Not related to the content of the social media
helping.Identity_and_Privacy2: Disclosing private correspondence of Yumyarn Co., Inc. or a third party
helping.Identity_and_Privacy3: Contains false content or misleading expressions
helping.Identity_and_Privacy4: Identifying or disclosing personal information without the permission of the individual involved
helping.Slanderous_content1: Posts containing slander against a specific individual, company, country, or region
helping.Violation_of_law_and_ethics1: Actions that violate the law or public order and morality
helping.Violation_of_law_and_ethics2: Actions that violate the law or public order and morality
helping.Advertising_and_commerce1: Posts promoting products, stores, or companies of oneself, containing advertising or commercial content
helping.Copying_and_Copyright_Infringement1: Copying, selling, or publishing information obtained through social media or other actions beyond personal use
helping.Copying_and_Copyright_Infringement2: Actions that violate or are likely to violate the copyright, trademark, right of publicity, privacy rights, or other rights of other users, third parties, or Yumyarn Co., Inc.
helping.Spam_and_Malware1: Sending spam, posting, or sending malicious computer programs
helping.Intervention_and_management1: Actions that interfere with the management of this social media or actions that may lead to interference with the management of this social media
helping.Violation_of_Terms_of_Use1: Actions contrary to the Terms of Use of the social media being used
helping.Other_inappropriate_actions1: Other actions that Yumyarn Co., Inc. deems inappropriate
